TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MachineKeySection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class MachineKeySection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定义控制密钥生成和算法的配置设置，这些密钥生成和算法在 Windows Forms 身份验证、视图状态验证和会话状态应用程序隔离中用于加密、解密和消息身份验证代码 (MAC) 操作。

span.span: Defines the configuration settings that control the key generation and algorithms that are used in encryption, decryption, and message authentication code (MAC) operations in Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改的内容`MachineKey`配置文件中的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `MachineKey` section in the configuration file. `MachineKey`部分可以在计算机 (Machine.config) 或应用程序 (Web.config) 级别配置和控制密钥和算法，可用于 Windows 窗体身份验证、 视图状态验证和会话状态应用程序隔离。The `MachineKey` section can be configured at the machine (Machine.config) or application (Web.config) level and controls the keys and algorithms that are used for Windows Forms authentication, view-state validation, and session-state application isolation. 若要在网络中 Web 服务器 （Web 场），这些功能的任何`DecryptionKey`和`ValidationKey`属性`MachineKey`部分必须显式并一致地使用配置有效的密钥值。For any of these features to work across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), the `DecryptionKey` and `ValidationKey` attributes of the `MachineKey` section must be configured explicitly and identically with valid key values. `AutoGenerate`值不适用于 Web 场，因为它依赖于密码随机密钥，它将保留使用计算机本地保护，并将不能跨多台计算机相同。The `AutoGenerate` value does not work for Web farms, because it relies on a cryptographically random secret, which is persisted using machine-local protection and will not be the same across more than one computer. ## Examples 本部分中的示例演示如何以声明方式为部分中，还可作为成员的访问的几个特性指定值类。The example in this section demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 配置文件的以下示例演示如何指定部分以声明方式的值。The following example from a configuration file shows how to specify values declaratively for the section. ``` ``` 下面的示例演示如何使用在代码中的类。The following example demonstrates how to use the class in code. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果你指定此配置节中的键为需要在 Web 场方案中，建议使用受保护的配置加密此节。
If you to specify keys in this configuration section, as is required in Web-farm scenarios, it is recommended that you encrypt this section by using protected configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.
The name of the application.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置此属性，如果设置属性。This property must be set if you set the property. 属性值传递给工厂方法。The property value is passed to the factory method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode CompatibilityMode { System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyCompatibilityMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定视图状态的升级加密方法是否在使用 .NET Framework 2.0 版 Service Pack 1 发行版后引入。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether upgraded encryption methods for view state that were introduced after the .NET Framework version 2.0 Service Pack 1 release are used.

value.span: 一个指示是否在使用 .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 发行版后引入的加密方法的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether encryption methods that were introduced after the .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 release are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更高版本的.NET Framework 中的升级的加密方法降低攻击者可以成功地风险反向工程处理`DecryptionKey`值。The upgraded encryption methods in later versions of the .NET Framework reduce the risk that an attacker can successfully reverse-engineer the `DecryptionKey` value. 为了保持向后兼容有较旧的加密方法。The older encryption methods are available in order to maintain backward compatibility. Web 场中的所有服务器都应都具有属性设置为相同的值。All servers in a Web farm should have the property set to the same value. 如果读取窗体身份验证票证的服务器具有不同设置比票证创建的服务器，就不会识别该票证。If the server that reads a forms authentication ticket has a different setting than the server that created the ticket, the ticket won't be recognized. 可以为指定以下值属性：The following values can be specified for the property: - `Framework20SP1`。`Framework20SP1`. 此值指定 ASP.NET 使用可用在的 ASP.NET 版本 2.0 SP2 之前的加密方法。This value specifies that ASP.NET uses encryption methods that were available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than 2.0 SP2. 如果任何服务器具有早于 2.0 SP2 的.NET framework 版本的 web 场中的所有服务器使用此值。Use this value for all servers in a web farm if any server has a version of the .NET Framework earlier than 2.0 SP2. 这是默认值，除非该应用程序 Web.config 文件具有`targetFramework`属性`httpRuntime`元素设置为"4.5"。This is the default value unless the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5". - `Framework20SP2`。`Framework20SP2`. 此值指定 ASP.NET 使用.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 中引入的升级的加密方法。This value specifies that ASP.NET uses upgraded encryption methods that were introduced in the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2. 此值用于 web 场中所有服务器，如果所有服务器都具有.NET Framework 2.0 SP2 或更高版本，但至少一个不都是.NET Framework 4.5。Use this value for all servers in a web farm if all servers have the .NET Framework 2.0 SP2 or later but at least one does not have the .NET Framework 4.5. - `Framework45`。`Framework45`. 实际上是为 ASP.NET 4.5 加密增强功能。Cryptographic enhancements for ASP.NET 4.5 are in effect. 这是默认值，如果应用程序 Web.config 文件具有`targetFramework`属性`httpRuntime`元素设置为"4.5"。This is the default value if the application Web.config file has the `targetFramework` attribute of the `httpRuntime` element set to "4.5". 当此属性设置为`Framework45`，以下限制已生效：When this property is set to `Framework45`, the following restrictions are in effect: - 如果 属性有值，则 属性必须有值。If the property has a value, the property must also have a value. 类要求提供一个非空应用程序名称。The class mandates that a non-empty application name be provided. - 属性必须是实际的验证算法 （例如，MD5、 SHA1、 HMACSHA256、 HMACSHA384、 HMACSHA512） 或自定义算法该子类类型。The attribute must be an actual validation algorithm (for example, MD5, SHA1, HMACSHA256, HMACSHA384, HMACSHA512) or a custom algorithm that subclasses the type. 禁止 AES 和 3DES 的值。The values AES and 3DES are forbidden. - 框架将不会生成仅用于签名的有效负载。The framework will not produce signed-only payloads. 窗体身份验证票证将始终被同时加密并签名，而不考虑如何`protection`属性`forms`元素设置的 Web.config 文件中。Forms authentication tickets will always be both encrypted and signed, regardless of how the `protection` attribute of the `forms` element is set in the Web.config file. 视图状态将始终进行同时加密或签名如果`EnableViewStateMac`或`RequireViewStateEncryption`为给定页设置。View state will always be both encrypted and signed if either `EnableViewStateMac` or `RequireViewStateEncryption` is set for a given page. 由于中所述的安全更新[Microsoft 安全公告 MS10-070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070)，默认加密行为是相同的`Framework20SP1`和`Framework20SP2`设置。As a result of the security update that is described in [Microsoft security bulletin MS10-070](http://technet.microsoft.com/security/bulletin/MS10-070), the default encryption behavior is the same for the `Framework20SP1` and `Framework20SP2` settings. 默认行为不建议更改，但如果你想要执行此操作，请参阅[如何在 ASP.NET 中配置旧加密模式](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938)。Changing the default behavior is not recommended, but if you want to do that, see [How to configure legacy encryption mode in ASP.NET](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/2425938).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataProtectorType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置数据保护器类型名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data protector type.
The default is .

value.span: 数据保护器类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the data protector type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定 ASP.NET 自定义的数据保护算法，请设置属性并将此属性设置为一个字符串，表示派生自的类类。To specify custom data protection algorithms for ASP.NET, set the property to and set this property to a string that represents a class that derives from the class. 此字符串对应于`providerClass`参数传递给静态工厂方法。This string corresponds to the `providerClass` parameter that is passed to the static factory method. 通过使用你指定的类和方法即使未指定选项。The class you specify is used by the and methods even if you do not specify the option. 如果设置此属性，则还必须设置属性。If you set this property, you must also set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Decryption { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定用于加密和解密 Forms 身份验证数据的加密算法。

span.span: Specifies the encryption algorithm that is used for encrypting and decrypting forms authentication data.

value.span: 指示用于加密和解密 Forms 身份验证数据的算法的值。

span.span: A value that indicates the algorithm that is used to encrypt and decrypt forms authentication data.

value.span: （有关如何指定视图状态加密时所使用算法的信息，请参见 属性。） 是默认值。

span.span: (For information about how to specify the algorithm that is used when view state is encrypted, see the property.) is the default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持以下的解密值：The property supports the following decryption values: - `Auto`这是默认值，指定 ASP.NET 确定要使用的加密算法基于配置默认设置。`Auto`, which is the default value, specifies that ASP.NET determines which encryption algorithm to use based on configuration default settings. - `AES`它指定 ASP.NET 使用算法来加密数据。`AES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the algorithm to encrypt data. `AES` 是默认的算法来加密数据。`AES` is the default algorithm to encrypt data. - `3DES`它指定 ASP.NET 使用算法来加密数据。`3DES`, which specifies that ASP.NET uses the algorithm to encrypt data. - 自定义算法中。A custom algorithm. 通常以声明方式设置此属性`decryption`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。For more information, see the element.

exception.span: 所选值不是解密值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the decryption values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DecryptionKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用来加密和解密数据的密钥，或生成密钥的过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the key that is used to encrypt and decrypt data, or the process by which the key is generated.

value.span: 密钥值或指示如何生成密钥的值。

span.span: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于加密和解密，例如在 Windows 窗体身份验证和视图状态时属性设置为"3DES"或"AES"。The property is used for encryption and decryption, such as in Windows Forms authentication, and for view state when the property is set to "3DES" or "AES". "自动生成"选项用于指定 ASP.NET 生成一个随机密钥，并将其存储在本地安全机构。Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority. "自动生成"选项是默认值的一部分。The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value. 如果将"IsolateApps"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的。If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 此为默认设置。This is the default setting. 如果将"IsolateByAppId"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的。If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 如果两个不同的应用程序共享的虚拟路径 (可能是因为这些应用程序正在运行在不同的端口上)，此标志可以用于进一步将它们与另一个区分开来。If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another. "IsolateByAppId"标志理解只能由 ASP.NET 4.5，但它可而不考虑设置。The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the setting. 如果你需要支持多个 Web 服务器 （Web 场） 的网络配置，设置属性手动来确保一致的配置。If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the property manually to ensure consistent configuration. 有关如何手动生成的值信息`DecryptionKey`属性，请参阅[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中配置 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113). 通常以声明方式设置此属性`DecryptionKey`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `DecryptionKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。For more information, see the element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置通过使用代码的属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#3)]

public: property System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyValidation Validation { System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyValidation get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::MachineKeyValidation value); };

summary.span: 指定用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的哈希算法。

span.span: Specifies the hashing algorithm that is used for validating forms authentication and view state data.

value.span: 指示用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的哈希算法的值。

span.span: A value that indicates the hashing algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性支持加密算法定义的枚举。The property supports encryption algorithms that are defined by the enumeration. 通常以声明方式设置此属性`decryption`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `decryption` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅元素。For more information, see the element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置通过使用代码的属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示用于验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的算法的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含预定义算法的名称或自定义算法的名称。

span.span: A string that contains the name of a predefined algorithm or the name of a custom algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的预定义的算法由定义枚举。The predefined algorithms that are available are defined by the enumeration. 如果你想要使用自定义算法，你不需要设置此属性。If you want to use a custom algorithm, you do not have to set this property. 设置属性设置为自定义算法的名称。Set the property to the name of the custom algorithm. 当你这样做时，此属性将自动设置为。When you do that, this property will automatically be set to . 你可以设置属性以声明方式在 Web.config 文件中或以编程方式在代码中。You can set the property declaratively in the Web.config file or programmatically in code. 若要以声明方式设置此属性，请使用`validationAlgorithm`的配置文件中的元素的属性。To set this property declaratively, you use the `validationAlgorithm` attribute of the element in the configuration file. 此属性可以设置为预定义算法或自定义算法的名称。This attribute can be set to the name of a predefined algorithm or of a custom algorithm. 由定义的预定义的算法枚举。The predefined algorithms are defined by the enumeration. 中指定自定义算法`validationAlgorithm`属性通过使用"alg:"前缀跟算法的名称。Custom algorithms are specified in the `validationAlgorithm` attribute by using the "alg:" prefix followed by the name of the algorithm. 如果你使用此格式指定自定义算法，属性设置为此属性设置为跟的名称和"alg:"前缀。If you use this format to specify a custom algorithm, the property is set to and this property is set to the name that follows the "alg:" prefix. 若要以编程方式设置此属性，使用一个由定义的预定义算法的值枚举，或将此属性设置为自定义算法名称。To set this property programmatically, use the value of one of the predefined algorithms that are defined by the enumeration, or set this property to a custom algorithm name. 如果将此属性设置自定义算法的名称，设置属性。If you set this property to the name of a custom algorithm, set the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置键，用来验证 Forms 身份验证和视图状态数据的代码，或生成密钥的过程。

span.span: Gets or sets the key that is used to validate forms authentication and view state data, or the process by which the key is generated.

value.span: 密钥值或指示如何生成密钥的值。

span.span: A key value, or a value that indicates how the key is generated.
The default is "AutoGenerate,IsolateApps".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性时`enableViewStateMAC`是`true`创建消息验证代码 (MAC)，以使 ASP.NET 可以确定视图状态是否已被篡改。The property is used when `enableViewStateMAC` is `true` to create a message authentication code (MAC) to enable ASP.NET to determine whether view state has been tampered with. 属性还用于生成进程外，应用程序特定的会话 Id，以确保该会话状态变量之间是相互隔离应用程序。The property is also used to generate out-of-process, application-specific session IDs to ensure that session state variables are isolated between applications. "自动生成"选项用于指定 ASP.NET 生成一个随机密钥，并将其存储在本地安全机构。Use the "AutoGenerate" option to specify that ASP.NET generates a random key and stores it in the Local Security Authority. "自动生成"选项是默认值的一部分。The "AutoGenerate" option is part of the default value. 如果将"IsolateApps"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的。If you add the "IsolateApps" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 此为默认设置。This is the default setting. 如果将"IsolateByAppId"修饰符添加到"AutoGenerate"值，ASP.NET 生成唯一的加密的密钥，每个应用程序通过使用每个应用程序的。If you add the "IsolateByAppId" modifier to the "AutoGenerate" value, ASP.NET generates a unique encrypted key for each application by using each application's . 如果两个不同的应用程序共享的虚拟路径 (可能是因为这些应用程序正在运行在不同的端口上)，此标志可以用于进一步将它们与另一个区分开来。If two distinct applications share a virtual path (perhaps because those applications are running on different ports), this flag can be used to further distinguish them from one another. "IsolateByAppId"标志理解只能由 ASP.NET 4.5，但它可而不考虑设置。The "IsolateByAppId" flag is understood only by ASP.NET 4.5, but it can be used regardless of the setting. 如果你需要支持多个 Web 服务器 （Web 场） 的网络配置，设置属性手动来确保一致的配置。If you need to support configuration across a network of Web servers (a Web farm), set the property manually to ensure consistent configuration. 有关如何手动生成的值信息`DecryptionKey`属性，请参阅[How To： 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中配置 MachineKey](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113)。For information about how to manually generate values for the `DecryptionKey` attribute, see [How To: Configure MachineKey in ASP.NET 2.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=155113). 通常以声明方式设置此属性`validationKey`的 Web.config 文件的元素的属性。This property is typically set declaratively in the `validationKey` attribute of the element of the Web.config file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置通过使用代码的属性。The following example shows how to set the property by using code. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/CS/machinekeysection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.MachineKeySection/VB/machinekeysection.vb#2)]
